Member Function Documentation

int autd::Geometry::AddDevice ( Eigen::Vector3f  position,
Eigen::Vector3f  euler_angles 
)

Add new device with position and rotation. Note that the transform is done with order: Translate -> Rotate.

Parameters
positionPosition of transducer #0, which is the one at the lower right corner.
euler_anglesZYZ convention Euler angle of the device.
Returns
an id of added device, which is used to delete or do other device specific controls.
